item.description:
Come meet Marie Bankuti, experience Life Coach!

What is Life/Success Coaching?
Imagine an athlete with unfocused, natural ability, or a singer with lots of raw, undeveloped talent. Coaches assist them to develop what they already possess naturally. That?s the idea behind Life Coaching!

Life Coaching is a thought provoking, creative partnership. In a safe and supportive atmosphere, the client is inspired to reach her maximum potential, both personally and professionally.
Join us for a taste of what Life Coaching is like. Participate in group activities and witness a coaching demonstration.

Bio:
Marie Bankuti, PMP, is a Life / Success Coach and independent consultant. Marie is trained by the internationally known Coaches Training Institute and remains a member in good standing of the International Coach Federation (ICF), the Project Management Institute (PMI), and the International Institute of Business Analysis (IIBA).


Please bring your business cards for a raffle! (Of course, bring extra cards to give to each other!)

By popular request, this meeting will be potluck. Please bring a snack or beverage to share. (No alcohol.) I will provide tablecloths, cups, plates and napkins.
item.how_to_find_us: I look like my picture on the site.
item.why: You'll have the opportunity to meet career women like you who want to support each other. Every month, we'll have a different speaker who will present a topic of interest. Plus, there will be lots of time for socializing!
item.name: Women in Business Network - Newton Meeting
